Description:
Jackpot!!! Modern Family Home, X3 Living Areas And BIG Views!!
This contemporary family home should be on everyone must see list! Boasting 3 generous bedrooms (master complete with ensuite), 3 separate living areas for the growing family, quality fixtures/fittings and an exceptional north facing entertaining area to capture BIG bay views!! The kitchen/family/meals area is bathed in natural light. An adjoining rumpus room is more than generous and could be used as a theatre room etc. The separate 3rd living area gives the floor plan even further flexibility. A double garage, off street parking and potential side access is more than adequate for the car, boat or the caravan! With all the modern comforts this family home simply has it all!!
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Things Come in Small Packages
Displaying a lovely street appeal great properties such as this are a rare find, with excellent lifestyle features to be enjoyed all on a spacious 697m2 allotment. Upon entry you will soon notice that this home has been much cared for with neutral tones and stunning Timber Flooring throughout.
The master bedroom positioned to the front of the home in this exceptional floorplan includes a Built In Robe, an additional two bedrooms with Built In robes completing the accommodation. Serviced by a 2-way central bathroom with recent modern updates for comfort, separate toilet and separate laundry promoting the functionality of this neatly presented home. The main living hub positioned in the heart of the home with a roomy kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances such as Gas Cooktop, Range Hood, Electric Oven and Two Draw Dishwasher, shared by the dining and living area with a large split system unit for year round comfort.
Step outside to the fantastic closed in entertaining area featuring a charming newly installed wood fireplace perfect to keep your guests warm while entertaining over the winter months. A spacious backyard with plenty of room to run free on the lush green lawns with minimal maintenance required and the commodity of two garden sheds plus a four car lock up garage for secure storage.
With the inclusion of a a 1 1/2 car garage as part of the home and access to the backyard through the roller door, completing this excellent package. Ideally located away from busy main roads yet within an arms shot of great local schools and the main hub of bustling Drysdale this is certainly an outstanding part of the Bellarine Peninsula to call home.
Insights: 30 Waulu Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Residential grandeur
One of The Bellarine Peninsula's most coveted addresses, with commanding views of Corio Bay and the You Yangs set the scene for the exceptional dimensions of this landmark home, set on approx. 1 acre, where refinement and relaxation are beautifully balanced. Circa 1991 based on timeless classic architecture.
The welcoming faade is based on manors of old and every detail in every room is reminiscent of an opulent period of grandeur.
The ornate pillars and heritage ceiling pelmets create a rich impression the moment you walk in to the entry foyer and continue throughout the residence. The adjoining study makes an impressive home office.
The formal lounge with a small sitting atrium for taking tea, offers spectacular views of Corio Bay and the grounds.
A separate formal dining room for entertaining guests could alternatively be utilised as a music room.
Modern kitchen with pantry and double fridge / freezer space overlooks the casual open plan dining and large living areas. A crockery cupboard for safely storing the fine bone china sets, required for hosting dinner parties.
Two bedrooms, including a superb main bedroom, both with walk in robe and uninterrupted bay views.
The grounds are a delight to walk around with the roses in full spring bloom and are a delight to view from every window of the residence.
The garden is immaculately presented. The paved undercover alfresco area, large instantly inviting lawn, established orchard, provide the perfect backdrop to a brilliant home with heating/cooling, water tank to maintain the grounds, solar panels the entire wish-list.
Insights: 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Don't Pass This One By!
This delightful 3 bedroom plus study home is a real find. Beautiful timber floors through out welcome you to what is a spacious family dwelling. Open plan kitchen, meals and family room with doors leading on to a generously sized outdoor entertainment area. The central lounge room is perfect for enjoying a quiet moment or two. All bedrooms have ceiling fans & robes- ensuite to master. The double garage has internal access into the home & drive through to the rear yard. Side access is perfect for storing the boat or caravan. Central heating and reverse cycle split system for year round temperature control. A lovely home worthy of your inspection.

Description:
Rare opportunity for bayside living with uninterrupted views
Enjoy superb waterside living in this brick veneer, 4 bedroom home nestled right above the shores of Corio Bay. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to buy in this tightly-held precinct with views to the You-Yangs, Mt Macedon and the lights of Melbourne.
In its 30 year history the home has had just 1 owner. In immaculate condition, it boasts a spacious modern floor plan encompassing 2 generously proportioned living spaces overlooking the gorgeous bay vista, comfortable bedrooms zoned for peace and privacy, and double lock up garage with internal and yard access. Extensive built-in storage areas abound.
The north-facing kitchen, formal dining and living areas are positioned to capture winter sun, while the wide verandah shields the summer sun, taking full advantage of the 180-degree water views. Entertainers will welcome the enormous kitchen, with wall oven and grill, separate gas cooktop, dishwasher and roomy butler’s pantry. The open plan living/dining area adjacent to the kitchen with wide breakfast bar caters for casual dining.
Three bedrooms feature huge built-in robes, and the master is serviced by a well-appointed en suite. The large central bathroom and convenient separate toilet are handy to bedrooms and living areas, and the large laundry comes with 2 large built-in storage cupboards, work bench and garden access.
Leisure options are unrivalled, with bayside walking trails, safe swimming, fishing and boating at the back door, tennis and golf within walking distance and renowned wineries, restaurants and provedores only minutes away.
Don’t miss your chance to secure this slice of heaven – view without delay!
Insights: 184 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Central and Relaxing Home
Choose a relaxing and comfortable lifestyle at this family friendly bayside address. Set within walking distance from primary schools and shops, it's a great location for all.
A north westerly aspect graces the open plan kitchen and living areas with floor to ceiling glazing ensures ample natural light and provides access to the veranda. The veranda extends to a spacious sun drenched deck with elevated views over the backyard.
The kitchen sits in view of the living area and deck, and offers a gas stove, dishwasher and large pantry. The free flowing indoor and outdoor spaces come off the kitchen.
At the front of the home the lounge flows to the master bedroom providing a private retreat for parents. Two further bedrooms bud off the open plan living area. The central wet areas include bathroom with bath and shower and separate toilet. These are easily accessed from both ends of the home.
Set close to the bay, boat ramp, The Dell and Golf course, this lifestyle rich home has much appeal!
Sam Edwards : 0498 427 939

Description:
Be the First to Move In!
If you're looking for an investment opportunity, to downsize or move out of home, this Unit is perfect for you! Quality construction and recently built, you will be the first to move into this brand spanking new home. Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite complimented with 2 additional bedrooms, both with Built in Robes. Open plan kitchen living area with quality fitout and appliances. Single garage with remote and internal access. Only a short drive or 10 minute walk to schools and the Drysdale Shopping Precinct. Low maintenance, established gardens enhance the surrounds. Located next to parkland ensures space and room to breathe! Rental assessment at $310/week. In association with Conjunctional Agent: Graeme Taylor Estate Agents, 315 Pakington St, Newtown, 3220 Ph: 5223 1677

Description:
Ticks all the boxes!
Surrounded by well-kept properties on a quiet street, this solid brick three bedroom home is minutes from the golf club and foreshore.
The moderate elevation of the site provides views of the bay and the floor plan delivers convenience and privacy, with gas heating, ceiling fans and a 1.5 kilowatt solar array for comfortable, thrifty living.
At the front of the home, the master bedroom, with built-in robes and ensuite, sits alongside a living room, creating a secluded retreat for relaxing downtime. Big bay windows in both rooms capture northern warmth and light.
The kitchen / meals / sitting area connects to a spacious covered deck for effortless outdoor entertaining.
Overlooking the deck and back garden, the generous kitchen includes plenty of storage and preparation space plus a large step-in pantry, under bench oven and gas cooktop.
This solid, tidy home presents an outstanding opportunity. View ASAP to fully appreciate the possibilities on offer.
Kerri Hughes : 0456 444 085

Description:
Just move in
A welcoming covered entry opening to the separate front lounge. Polished floating timber floors are a feature throughout. Sliding door opens to a private side balcony with shade awnings.
Modern kitchen with 900 mm oven, 1 & 1/2 fridge cavity, dishwasher & dining area.
Middle bedroom is spacious & could double as a second living room / study.
Master bedroom with a large ensuite & built in robes.
The central bathroom has a step-less tiled shower & double vanities.
The raised under covered timber deck overlooks a generous yard & is perfect for summer BBQ's.
Landscaped gardens, open carport with double gate access to the backyard.
Nothing to do, well almost...with great access you can build the shed of your dreams in the backyard.

Description:
Entertainers Dream On Double Block
This beautiful family home offers 3 large bedrooms, the master with ensuite and WIR and remaining bedrooms have BIR's. It has been lovingly renovated with new carpets throughout, freshly painted, ceiling fans in all bedrooms and a new stunning bespoke kitchen with large Electrolux double oven, s/s appliances including 900mm range hood and cook top and caesar stone bench tops.
The flexible floor plan includes formal sitting room at the front of the home while the heart of the home is the huge open plan kitchen/dining/living area which is flooded in natural light and takes in views of the lush green gardens.
Outside is an entertainer's paradise with large in ground solar heated pool, 2 separate under cover areas and sundeck to laze on during the summer months.
With extras such as central heating, double remote garage with internal access, a separate side entrance with single carport for the boat or caravan, a large vegie patch with fruit trees and a 5kw solar power system for those wanting a touch of the "good life".
With so much on offer and spread over a huge 1,168m2 (approx) double block plus the possibility for future sub-division (STCA) there really is nothing left to do but move in and enjoy all the many benefits this home has to offer.
Insights: 3-5 Camberwarra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
“Avignon” – Perfect Coastal Retreat with Views!
This beautifully presented and quality built home is situated on a substantial corner allotment of 695m2 in a very convenient spot close to the beach, local shops, parks and a Golf Course. It offers expansive views over the Corio Bay and You Yangs that can be seen from ground and first floor of the home. You have to see it in order to fully appreciate this French influence inspired home.
It features:
- 4 good size bedrooms with built in robes
- Upstairs master has walk in robe and two way bathroom/ensuite and parents retreat with access to the undercover balcony
- Guest bedroom downstairs has walk in robe and ensuite
- Spacious lounge with gas log fire, French doors to the undercover front verandah and exposed brick walls
- Study area with store room downstairs
- Central bathroom with cast iron claw foot bath, separate shower, toilet and vanity
- Well equipped blackwood kitchen with ample cupboard space, dishwasher, electric oven and stove
- Second living area downstairs can be used as a kids play room or rumpus
- Extra large 2 car garage with workshop and the storage loft
- Manicured front and side gardens, low maintenance paved backyard with possible access from the Court with room for a boat
Extras include: RC/AC, 9ft ceilings, antique doors and stained glass windows, 2 x garden sheds
Don’t miss this opportunity to secure your perfect coastal retreat and call now to organize an inspection.
Insights: 8 Carmel Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN HOME ON A 700m2. THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME.
Set on a 700m2 with access to and surrounded by council reserve, this modern home bucks the trend to offer space and quality in the one package. 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, with study/nursery/4th bedroom, north facing open plan family, dining and quality european kitchen, second living space, alfresco entertaining, privacy and seclusion with only 1 neighbor. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and ample off street parking for 2 cars and a boat or caravan complete this stunning package, rare to find - easy to inspect.

Description:
Neat as a pin
A meticulously maintained family home. With two generous living areas serviced by a central galley style kitchen. A fabulous covered outdoor entertainment with shade blinds will make you the envy of summer BBQ's.
A private entry blocks out any adverse weather.
Modern kitchen with wall oven, dishwasher, microwave alcove under bench, lots of pot draws & ceramic hotplates. A large private pantry so big it's like a mini-store.
The home is heated by a modern replica gas log fire place & cooled by a split system reverse cycle air conditioner.
Three generous bedrooms, one with ensuite, the main with a separate nursery / study & all with built in robes.
Modern bathroom with separate bath & shower.
A large newly erected shed at the rear of the property would make an ideal boat, classic car or man cave shed.

Description:
Big Block With Room For All The Toys!!!
Check out this recently renovated 4 bedroom plus study family home, on a Big Block of approx.1250sqm. With extensive off road parking and drive through double garage, it boasts room for all the toys. This ideal family home is centrally located in Clifton Springs within 1km to the Clifton Springs Golf Club, 1.5km to Boat Ramp and 2 km to either Clifton Springs/Drysdale Primary School.
Sit back and entertain in the formal lounge - open fireplace during those colder days and split system cooler for the summer months. The kitchen has extensive hardwood cabinetry, a large walk in pantry, floor boards, electric appliances and opens to a pleasant dining area with gas fire heater. The four bedrooms are accessed from a central hallway with new carpet throughout and all with built-in robes. The end of the hallway brings you to the main bedroom boasting a large ensuite, BIRs and separate additional cupboard storage. The family bathroom and laundry have been recently renovated. All the hard work has already been completed. A large backyard with a generous lawn for the kids, vegetable gardens and fruit trees, plus at the rear of the property a large 9m x 7m lined shed with enclosed 3m x 7m workshop can also house the family boat or pop up caravan. This sought after property is a must see, come and inspect now.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
